## NumberParser.norm() method

Normalize a locale-specific number string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
norm(s: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string | the number string to parse in this instance's locale |

**Returns:**

string

the number string normalized into a JavaScript number string
